user_profile.name: Amir Al-Hassan
user_profile.description: Amir, a 67-year-old retired engineer, has lived in the Middle East for his entire life. With advanced tech experience, he approaches tasks with a cautious but analytical mindset. Currently seeking to rent an apartment in an office environment, Amir feels it's urgent to find a suitable living space that accommodates his sedentary lifestyle while allowing him to maintain independence and comfort.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online listings and local real estate offices
additional_requirements: Single-story units suitable for limited mobility
